com.teamwork.autocomplete.view

Interface AutoCompleteViewBinder<Model>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleItemViewBinder

    @MainThread
public interface AutoCompleteViewBinder<Model>
    View binder interface that an AutoCompleteTypeAdapters use to allow the auto complete component to render the desired UI into the auto complete drop down.
    See Also:
    AutoCompleteTypeAdapter

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bindData(AutoCompleteViewHolder viewHolder, Model item, java.lang.CharSequence constraint)
      Bind the data for the passed model to the view held from the AutoCompleteViewHolder implementation, which must be cast to the concrete type.
      long getItemId(Model item)
      Return a numeric identifier for the passed model.
      int getItemLayoutId()
      Return the layout resource identifier to be used in the auto complete adapter.
      AutoCompleteViewHolder getViewHolder(android.view.View view)
      Return a layout-specific implementation of AutoCompleteViewHolder for the adapter to access sub-views faster, following Android's suggested view binder pattern.

    • Method Detail

      • getItemId

        long getItemId(@NonNull
               Model item)
        Return a numeric identifier for the passed model. The returned value must be unique and "stable" (see BaseAdapter.hasStableIds().
        Parameters:
        item - The item to return the identifier of.
        Returns:
        A long identifier for the item.

      • getItemLayoutId

        @LayoutRes
int getItemLayoutId()
        Return the layout resource identifier to be used in the auto complete adapter. This will then be used by the type adapter AutoCompleteViewHolder and data binder.

      • getViewHolder

        @NonNull
AutoCompleteViewHolder getViewHolder(@NonNull
                                              android.view.View view)
        Return a layout-specific implementation of AutoCompleteViewHolder for the adapter to access sub-views faster, following Android's suggested view binder pattern.
        Parameters:
        view - The view to create a view holder.
        Returns:
        The AutoCompleteViewHolder instance.

      • bindData

        void bindData(@NonNull
              AutoCompleteViewHolder viewHolder,
              @NonNull
              Model item,
              @Nullable
              java.lang.CharSequence constraint)
        Bind the data for the passed model to the view held from the AutoCompleteViewHolder implementation, which must be cast to the concrete type.
        Parameters:
        viewHolder - The AutoCompleteViewHolder returned by the adapter.
        item - The item whose data must be bound to the view.
        constraint - The current text filter constraint, if any. This can be used to manipulate the UI for the current item if it matches the constraint.
